mapper.select: SELECT B.*, DECODE( TO_CHAR(CDATETIME, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), TO_CHAR(CDATETIME, 'HH24:MI:SS'), TO_CHAR(CDATETIME, 'YYYY-MM-DD') ) AS CDATE FROM TBL_BBS B ORDER BY BBS_NUM DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_BBS VALUES(BBS_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{title}, #{contents}, 0, #{userId}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE)
